title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot_simple: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
filming_locations: 110 Longfellow Road, Staten Island, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Godfather: Part II
filming_locations: 6th Street, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.
also_known_as: Mario Puzo's The Godfather: Part II

title: Pulp Fiction
filming_locations: 1525 N. Van Ness Avenue, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo.
plot_simple: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
also_known_as: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

title: 12 Angry Men
filming_locations: Fox Movietone Studio, New York, USA
plot_simple: A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.

title: The Dark Knight
filming_locations: 2 International Finance Centre, Central, Hong Kong, China
plot_simple: When Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent launch an assault on the mob, they let the clown out of the box, the Joker, bent on turning Gotham on itself and bringing any heroes down to his level.

title: Schindler's List
filming_locations: Auschwitz-Birkenau Concentration Camp, Oswiecim, Malopolskie, Poland
plot_simple: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
filming_locations: Camperdown Studios, Camperdown Road, Miramar, Wellington, New Zealand
plot_simple: Aragorn leads the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw the dark lord's gaze from Frodo and Sam who are on the doorstep of Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Fight Club
filming_locations: 421 W. Eighth Street, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that transforms into a violent revolution.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
filming_locations: Alcatraz Island, San Francisco Bay, California, USA
plot_simple: As Luke trains with Master Yoda to become a Jedi Knight, his friends evade the Imperial fleet under the command of Darth Vader who is obsessed with turning Skywalker to the Dark Side of the Force.
also_known_as: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
filming_locations: Arrowtown Recreational Reserve, Arrowtown, Otago, New Zealand
plot_simple: A meek hobbit of The Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
plot_simple: Upon arriving at a mental institution, a brash rebel rallies the patients to take on the oppressive Nurse Ratched, a woman more dictator than nurse.

title: Inception
filming_locations: 1240 S Hope St, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: In a world where technology exists to enter the human mind through dream invasion, a highly skilled thief is given a final chance at redemption which involves executing his toughest job to date: Inception.

title: Goodfellas
filming_locations: 2409 Thirty Second Street, Astoria, Queens, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.

title: Star Wars
plot_simple: Luke Skywalker, a spirited farm boy, joins rebel forces to save Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader, and the galaxy from the Empire's planet-destroying Death Star.
also_known_as: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope

title: Shichinin no samurai
plot_simple: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

title: Forrest Gump
filming_locations: Ambassador Hotel - 3400 Wilshire Boulevard, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny, eludes him.

title: The Matrix
filming_locations: AON Tower, Kent Street, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
plot_simple: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
filming_locations: Camperdown Studios, Camperdown Road, Miramar, Wellington, New Zealand
plot_simple: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Cidade de Deus
filming_locations: Cidade de Deus, Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
plot_simple: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

title: Se7en
filming_locations: Spring Street Towers - 650 S. Spring Street, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot_simple: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

title: C'era una volta il West
plot_simple: Epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.
also_known_as: Once Upon a Time in the West

title: Casablanca
plot_simple: Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

title: The Usual Suspects
filming_locations: City Hall - 200 N. Spring Street, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
plot_simple: Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.
also_known_as: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark

title: Rear Window
plot_simple: A wheelchair bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
plot_simple: An angel helps a compassionate but despairingly frustrated businessman by showing what life would have been like if he never existed.
also_known_as: Frank Capra's It's a Wonderful Life

title: Psycho
filming_locations: 4270 Lankershim Boulevard, North Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A young woman steals $40,000 from her employer's client, and subsequently encounters a young motel proprietor too long under the domination of his mother.

title: Léon
filming_locations: 1 Centre Street, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A professional assassin rescues a teenage girl whose parents were killed in a police raid.

title: Sunset Blvd.
filming_locations: Alto-Nido Apartments -1851 N. Ivar Street, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent-film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.

title: American History X
filming_locations: Johnie's Coffee Shop - 6101 Wilshire Boulevard, Fairfax, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

title: Memento
plot_simple: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

title: Apocalypse Now
plot_simple: During the on-going Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade Green Beret who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
plot_simple: The cyborg who once tried to kill Sarah Connor is dead, and another T-101 must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from an even more powerful and advanced Terminator, the T-1000.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot_simple: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of US soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
plot_simple: An insane general starts a process to nuclear holocaust that a war room of politicians and generals frantically try to stop.

title: City Lights
filming_locations: Chaplin Studios - 1416 N. La Brea Avenue, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: The Tramp struggles to help a blind flower girl he has fallen in love with.
also_known_as: City Lights: A Comedy Romance in Pantomime

title: Alien
filming_locations: Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, Surrey, England, UK
plot_simple: The crew of a commercial deep space mining ship, investigating a suspected S.O.S., lands on a distant planet and discovers a nest of strange eggs.

title: North by Northwest
plot_simple: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
plot_simple: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.

title: Django Unchained
filming_locations: Second Line Stages, New Orleans, Louisiana, USA
plot_simple: With the help of his mentor, a slave-turned-bounty hunter sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: Modern Times
plot_simple: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: Citizen Kane
filming_locations: New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
filming_locations: El Camino College, Torrance, California, USA
plot_simple: Eight years on, a new terrorist leader, Bane, overwhelms Gotham's finest, and the Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.

title: The Shining
plot_simple: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

title: Back to the Future
plot_simple: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.

title: The Pianist
plot_simple: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

title: The Departed
plot_simple: Two men from opposite sides of the law are undercover within the Massachusetts State Police and the Irish mafia, but violence and bloodshed boil when discoveries are made, and the moles are dispatched to find out their enemy's identities.

title: La vita è bella
plot_simple: A Jewish man has a wonderful romance with the help of his humour, but must use that same quality to protect his son in a Nazi death camp.

title: M
plot_simple: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.
also_known_as: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder

title: Vertigo
filming_locations: 1000 Mason Street, North Beach, San Francisco, California, USA
plot_simple: A retired San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's much-younger wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

title: Paths of Glory
plot_simple: When soldiers in WW1 refuse to continue with an impossible attack, their superiors decide to make an example of them.

title: American Beauty
filming_locations: 11388 Homedale Street, Brentwood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend.

title: Taxi Driver
filming_locations: 13 St between 2nd & 3rd Avenues, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A mentally unstable Vietnam war veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge to violently lash out, attempting to save a teenage prostitute in the process.

title: Double Indemnity
filming_locations: 1825 N. Kingsley Drive, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: An insurance rep lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.

title: Aliens
filming_locations: Acton Lane Power Station, Acton Lane, Acton, London, England, UK
plot_simple:
The planet from 
 has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

title: Toy Story 3
plot_simple: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: WALL·E
plot_simple: In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

title: Das Leben der Anderen
plot_simple: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

title: Intouchables
plot_simple: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caretaker.

title: Gladiator
plot_simple: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

title: The Green Mile
plot_simple: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: A Clockwork Orange
filming_locations: EMI-MGM Studios, Borehamwood, Herts, England, UK
plot_simple: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem... but not all goes to plan.

title: The Great Dictator
plot_simple: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel has a doppelganger, a poor but kind Jewish barber living in the slums, who one day is mistaken for Hynkel.

title: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
plot_simple: Amelie, an innocent and naive girl in Paris, with her own sense of justice, decides to help those around her and along the way, discovers love.

title: The Prestige
filming_locations: Spring Street Towers - 650 S. Spring Street, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: The rivalry between two magicians is exacerbated when one of them performs the ultimate illusion.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
plot_simple: Epic rumination on a flamboyant and controversial British military figure and his conflicted loyalties during wartime service.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
filming_locations: Courthouse Square, Backlot, Universal Studios - 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, California, USA
plot_simple: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.

title: Reservoir Dogs
filming_locations: 5860 North Figueroa Street, Highland Park, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: Das Boot
plot_simple: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.

title: The Third Man
plot_simple: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, black-market opportunist Harry Lime.
also_known_as: Carol Reed's Production The Third Man

title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
plot_simple: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.

title: Requiem for a Dream
filming_locations: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island individuals are shattered when their addictions become stronger.

title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
plot_simple: Fred Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
filming_locations: 123 Valentine Lane, Yonkers, New York, USA
plot_simple: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.
also_known_as: Eterno resplandor de una mente sin recuerdos

title: The Lion King
plot_simple: Tricked into thinking he killed his father, a guilt ridden lion cub flees into exile and abandons his identity as the future King.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
filming_locations: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to Brooklyn over 30 years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
plot_simple: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the Second Death Star, while Luke Skywalker tries to bring his father back to the Light Side of the Force.

title: Full Metal Jacket
plot_simple: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow Marine recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting set in 1968 in Hue, Vietnam.

title: L.A. Confidential
filming_locations: 1277 S. Cochran Ave, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - the straight-laced, the brutal, and the sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Chinatown
filming_locations: 1315 South El Molino Drive, South Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: A private detective investigating an adultery case stumbles on to a scheme of murder that has something to do with water.

title: Braveheart
plot_simple: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

title: Oldeuboi
plot_simple: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
filming_locations: Appin, Argyll and Bute, Scotland, UK
plot_simple: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many very silly obstacles.
also_known_as: Mønti Pythøn ik den Høli Gräilen

title: Singin' in the Rain
filming_locations: Grauman's Chinese Theater - 6925 Hollywood Blvd., Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

title: Some Like It Hot
plot_simple: When two musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

runtime: USA: 123 min (2002 Murnau Foundation 75th aniversary restored version)
119 min (DVD edition) (2002 Murnau Foundation 75th aniversary restored version)
title: Metropolis
plot_simple: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

title: Ladri di biciclette
filming_locations: Citta Valmelaina, Via Salaria, Rome, Lazio, Italy
plot_simple: A man and his son search for a stolen bicycle vital for his job.

title: Amadeus
plot_simple: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told in flashback by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

title: Rashômon
plot_simple: A heinous crime and its aftermath are recalled from differing points of view.

title: Mononoke-hime
plot_simple: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
filming_locations: Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, Surrey, England, UK
plot_simple: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial, object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

title: All About Eve
filming_locations: 21 Club - 21 West 52nd Street, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: An ingenue insinuates herself in to the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

title: The Sting
filming_locations: Biltmore Hotel - 506 S. Grand Avenue, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: In 1930s Chicago, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.

title: Unforgiven
plot_simple: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
filming_locations: Administration Building, Treasure Island, San Francisco Bay, California, USA
plot_simple: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis.
also_known_as: Indiana Jones y la última cruzada

title: The Apartment
filming_locations: 205 Columbus Avenue, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

title: Raging Bull
filming_locations: Culver Studios - 9336 W. Washington Blvd., Culver City, California, USA
plot_simple: An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring, destroys his life outside it.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
plot_simple: After settling his differences with a Japanese PoW camp commander, a British colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors - while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.
also_known_as: El puente sobre el río Kwai

title: Witness for the Prosecution
filming_locations: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios - 10202 W. Washington Blvd., Culver City, California, USA
plot_simple: Agatha Christie tale of a man on trial for murder: a trial featuring surprise after surprise.

title: Hotaru no haka
plot_simple: A tragic film covering a young boy and his little sister's struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: Die Hard
filming_locations: 29th-35th Floors, Fox Plaza - 2121 Avenue of the Stars, Century City, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save wife Holly Gennaro and several others, taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: Batman Begins
filming_locations: Canary Wharf, Isle of Dogs, London, England, UK
plot_simple: Bruce Wayne loses his philanthropic parents to a senseless crime, and years later becomes the Batman to save the crime-ridden Gotham City on the verge of destruction by an ancient order.

title: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
plot_simple: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

title: Yôjinbô
plot_simple: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

title: Inglourious Basterds
plot_simple: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: Snatch.
filming_locations: Bethnal Green Town Hall, Bethnal Green, London, England, UK
plot_simple: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

filming_locations: Almería Railway Station, Almería, Andalucía, Spain
title: Per qualche dollaro in più
plot_simple: Two bounty hunters with completely different intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

title: Der Untergang
filming_locations: Bavaria Filmstudios, Geiselgasteig, Grünwald, Bavaria, Germany
plot_simple: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

title: El laberinto del fauno
plot_simple: In the fascist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

title: The Great Escape
filming_locations: Bavaria Filmstudios, Geiselgasteig, Grünwald, Bavaria, Germany
plot_simple: Allied POWs plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
filming_locations: Columbia/Sunset Gower Studios - 1438 N. Gower Street, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the US Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.
also_known_as: Frank Capra's Mr. Smith Goes to Washington

title: Up
plot_simple: By tying thousands of balloons to his home, 78-year-old Carl sets out to fulfill his lifelong dream to see the wilds of South America. Russell, a wilderness explorer 70 years younger, inadvertently becomes a stowaway.

title: Toy Story
plot_simple: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: On the Waterfront
filming_locations: Court Street, Hoboken, New Jersey, USA
plot_simple: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

title: The Elephant Man
plot_simple: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous facade, there is revealed a person of intelligence and sensitivity.

title: Det sjunde inseglet
plot_simple: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: Heat
plot_simple: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: The General
plot_simple: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single handedly and straight through enemy lines.

title: The Maltese Falcon
filming_locations: Bush Street, San Francisco, California, USA
plot_simple: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

title: Blade Runner
filming_locations: Warner Brothers Burbank Studios - 4000 Warner Boulevard, Burbank, California, USA
plot_simple: Deckard, a blade runner, has to track down and terminate 4 replicants who hijacked a ship in space and have returned to earth seeking their maker.

title: Rebecca
plot_simple: When a naive young woman marries a rich widower and settles in his gigantic mansion, she finds the memory of the first wife maintaining a grip on her husband and the servants.

title: Gran Torino
filming_locations: 204 W 11 Mile Rd, Royal Oak, Michigan, USA
plot_simple: Disgruntled Korean War vet Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a young Hmong teenager, who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: his 1972 Gran Torino.

runtime: 50 min (1971 edit with new Chaplin score)
title: The Kid
filming_locations: Chaplin Studios - 1416 N. La Brea Avenue, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

title: Smultronstället
plot_simple: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

title: Scarface
filming_locations: 8648 West Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, California, USA
plot_simple: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel while succumbing to greed.

title: Fargo
plot_simple: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Ran
plot_simple: An elderly lord abdicates to his three sons, and the two corrupt ones turn against him.

title: The Big Lebowski
filming_locations: 10231 Charing Cross Road, Beverly Hills, California, USA
plot_simple: "Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: Touch of Evil
filming_locations: Universal Studios - 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, California, USA
plot_simple: Stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in Mexican border town.

title: The Deer Hunter
plot_simple: An in-depth examination of the way that the Vietnam war affects the lives of people in a small industrial town in the USA.

title: Cool Hand Luke
plot_simple: A man refuses to conform to life in a rural prison.

runtime: 95 min (24 fps) (original version: Los Angeles, California, 1925)
USA: 81 min (24 fps) (edited version: New York release, 1925)
title: The Gold Rush
plot_simple: The Tramp goes the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
filming_locations: Bethnal Green Town Hall, Bethnal Green, London, England, UK
plot_simple: Four London working class stiffs pool their money to put one in a high stakes card game, but things go wrong and they end up owing half a million pounds and having one week to come up with the cash.
also_known_as: Juegos, trampas y dos armas humeantes

title: It Happened One Night
filming_locations: Busch Gardens - S. Grove Avenue, Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: A spoiled heiress, running away from her family, is helped by a man who's actually a reporter looking for a story.

title: No Country for Old Men
plot_simple: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: Sin City
plot_simple: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

title: Strangers on a Train
filming_locations: Danbury Railroad Station - 120 White Street, Danbury, Connecticut, USA
plot_simple: A psychotic socialite confronts a pro tennis star with a theory on how two complete strangers can get away with murder...a theory that he plans to implement.

title: Jaws
plot_simple: When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and grizzled fisherman set out to stop it.

title: The Sixth Sense
plot_simple: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: Platoon
plot_simple: A young recruit in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

title: Casino
filming_locations: 357 Desert Inn Road, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA
plot_simple: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.

title: The Avengers
plot_simple: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. brings together a team of super humans to form The Avengers to help save the Earth from Loki and his army.

title: The Thing
plot_simple: Scientists in the Antarctic are confronted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of the people that it kills.

title: High Noon
plot_simple: A marshall, personally compelled to face a returning deadly enemy, finds that his own town refuses to help him.

title: Trainspotting
filming_locations: 78A Talgarth Road, West Kensington, London, England, UK
plot_simple: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
plot_simple: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

title: Hotel Rwanda
plot_simple: The true-life story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

title: The Wizard of Oz
plot_simple: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
filming_locations: 5506 Atlas St, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: The Bride wakes up after a long coma. The baby that she carried before entering the coma is gone. The only thing on her mind is to have revenge on the assassination team that betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

title: Good Will Hunting
plot_simple: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: Warrior
plot_simple: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision corner with his older brother.

title: Annie Hall
filming_locations: 2nd Avenue, Manhattan, New York City, new york, USA
plot_simple: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.

title: El secreto de sus ojos
plot_simple: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Gone with the Wind
plot_simple: American classic in which a manipulative woman and a roguish man carry on a turbulent love affair in the American south during the Civil War and Reconstruction.
also_known_as: Lo que el viento se llevó

title: The Grapes of Wrath
filming_locations: Backlot, 20th Century Fox Studios - 10201 Pico Blvd., Century City, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A poor Midwest family is forced off of their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

title: Notorious
plot_simple: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: Tonari no Totoro
plot_simple: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wonderous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: Into the Wild
plot_simple: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

title: V for Vendetta
plot_simple: A shadowy freedom fighter known only as "V" uses terrorist tactics to fight against his totalitarian society. Upon rescuing a girl from the secret police, he also finds his best chance at having an ally.
also_known_as: V for Vendetta: At the IMAX

title: Life of Brian
plot_simple: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

title: Finding Nemo
plot_simple: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Dial M for Murder
filming_locations: Stage 20, Warner Brothers Burbank Studios - 4000 Warner Boulevard, Burbank, California, USA
plot_simple: An ex-tennis pro carries out a plot to murder his wife. When things go wrong, he improvises a brilliant plan B.
also_known_as: Alfred Hitchcock's Dial M for Murder

title: How to Train Your Dragon
plot_simple: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
also_known_as: How to Train Your Dragon: An IMAX 3D Experience

title: The King's Speech
filming_locations: 33 Portland Place, Marylebone, London, England, UK
plot_simple: The story of King George VI of Britain, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch become worthy of it.

title: There Will Be Blood
plot_simple: A story about family, greed, religion, and oil, centered around a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

title: The Big Sleep
filming_locations: New York Street, Warner Brothers Burbank Studios - 4000 Warner Boulevard, Burbank, California, USA
plot_simple: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

title: Ben-Hur
plot_simple: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
also_known_as: Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ

title: The Night of the Hunter
filming_locations: CBS Studio Center - 4024 Radford Avenue, Studio City, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

title: Network
filming_locations: CFTO-TV Studios, Scarborough, Toronto, Ontario, Canada
plot_simple: A TV network cynically exploits a deranged ex-TV anchor's ravings and revelations about the media for their own profit.

title: The Terminator
filming_locations: Tunnel at Lower Grand & West Gen Thad Kosciuszko Way, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A cyborg is sent back in time, by the sinister computer network Skynet, to murder a woman who will one day give birth to the leader of the militia destined to end the coming robo-apocalypse.

title: Million Dollar Baby
filming_locations: Hollywood Athletic Club - 6525 W. Sunset Blvd., Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A hardened trainer/manager works with a determined woman in her attempt to establish herself as a boxer.

title: Stand by Me
filming_locations: 380 South San Rafael Avenue, Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives

plot_simple: Three WWII veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.
also_known_as: Samuel Goldwyn's The Best Years of Our Lives

title: Groundhog Day
plot_simple: A weatherman finds himself living the same day over and over again.

title: Donnie Darko
plot_simple: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.

title: Twelve Monkeys
filming_locations: 344 North Gay Street, Baltimore, Maryland, USA
plot_simple: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
plot_simple: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

title: Les quatre cents coups
plot_simple: Intensely touching story of a misunderstood young adolescent who left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

title: Black Swan
filming_locations: Bowling Green, Lower Manhattan, Manhattan, New YORK City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A ballet dancer wins the lead in "Swan Lake" and is perfect for the role of the delicate White Swan - Princess Odette - but slowly loses her mind as she becomes more and more like Odile, the Black Swan.

title: Amores perros
filming_locations: Colonia Condesa, Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico
plot_simple: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

title: Mary and Max
plot_simple: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

title: The Bourne Ultimatum
plot_simple: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

filming_locations: Rock and Pillar Range, Otago, New Zealand
title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
plot_simple: A curious Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, journeys to the Lonely Mountain with a vigorous group of Dwarves to reclaim a treasure stolen from them by the dragon Smaug.

title: Persona
plot_simple: A nurse is put in charge of an actress who can't talk and finds that the actress's persona is melding with hers.

title: Gandhi
filming_locations: Aga Khan Palace, Nagar Rd, Pune, Maharashtra, India
plot_simple: Biography of , the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of non-violent protest.

title: Hauru no ugoku shiro
plot_simple: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking home.

title: The Killing
plot_simple: Crooks plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

title: Life of Pi
plot_simple: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor ... a fearsome Bengal tiger.

title: The Graduate
filming_locations: 607 North Palm Drive, Beverly Hills, California, USA
plot_simple: Recent college graduate Benjamin Braddock is trapped into an affair with Mrs. Robinson, who happens to be the wife of his father's business partner and then finds himself falling in love with her daughter, Elaine.

title: The Princess Bride
plot_simple: A classic fairy tale, with swordplay, giants, an evil prince, a beautiful princess, and yes, some kissing (as read by a kindly grandfather).

title: A Beautiful Mind
plot_simple: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn to the nightmarish.

title: 8½
filming_locations: Cinecittà Studios, Cinecittà, Rome, Lazio, Italy
plot_simple: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

also_known_as: Edward Albee's Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

title: The Hustler
plot_simple: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
plot_simple: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?" He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.

title: La strada
plot_simple: A carefree girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.

title: Rocky

plot_simple: A small time boxer gets a once in a lifetime chance to fight the heavyweight champ in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

title: The Manchurian Candidate
filming_locations: 67 Riverside Drive, Manhattan, new York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A former Korean War POW is brainwashed by Communists into becoming a political assassin. But another former prisoner may know how to save him.

title: Anatomy of a Murder

plot_simple: In a murder trial, the defendant says he suffered temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

title: The Wild Bunch
plot_simple: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

title: The Exorcist

plot_simple: When a girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

title: Stalag 17

plot_simple: Two young men strangle their "inferior" classmate, hide his body in their apartment, and invite his friends and family to a dinner party as a means to challenge the "perfection" of their crime.

title: The Artist
filming_locations: Fremont Mansion - 56 Fremont Place, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A silent movie star meets a young dancer, but the arrival of talking pictures sends their careers in opposite directions.

title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
plot_simple: A senator, who became famous for killing a notorious outlaw, returns for the funeral of an old friend and tells the truth about his deed.

title: Barry Lyndon

plot_simple: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's position in 18th Century aristocracy.

title: Sleuth
filming_locations: Athelhampton House, Athelhampton, Dorset, England, UK
plot_simple: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

title: Stalker
plot_simple: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

title: Mou gaan dou

title: In the Name of the Father

plot_simple: Man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he didn't do imprisons his father as well; a British lawyer helps fight for their freedom.

title: Roman Holiday

plot_simple: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: The Truman Show
filming_locations: Falls Lake, Backlot, Universal Studios - 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, California, USA
plot_simple: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a TV show.

title: Salinui chueok
plot_simple: In 1986, in the province of Gyunggi, in South Korea, a second young and beautiful woman is found dead...

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
filming_locations: Bequia, St Vincent and the Grenadines
plot_simple: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: Monsters, Inc.

title: District 9
plot_simple: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.

title: Per un pugno di dollari
plot_simple: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

title: Yip Man
plot_simple: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the first martial arts master to teach the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
plot_simple: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord.
also_known_as: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 3D

title: Le scaphandre et le papillon
plot_simple: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.
also_known_as: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly

title: Ratatouille
plot_simple: Remy is a young rat in the French countryside who arrives in Paris, only to find out that his cooking idol is dead. When he makes an unusual alliance with a restaurant's new garbage boy, the culinary and personal adventures begin despite Remy's family's skepticism and the rat-hating world of humans.

title: Star Trek
plot_simple: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

title: A Streetcar Named Desire
plot_simple: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

title: La haine
plot_simple: After local youth Abdel is beaten unconscious by police, a riot ensues on his estate during which a policeman loses his gun. The gun is found by Vinz who threatens he will kill a cop if Abdel dies.

title: Beauty and the Beast
filming_locations: Walt Disney Feature Animation - 500 S. Buena Vista Street, Burbank, California, USA
plot_simple: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead and discovers her captor to be an enchanted prince.

title: Shutter Island
filming_locations: Acadia National Park, Bar Harbor, Maine, USA
plot_simple: Drama set in 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding nearby.

title: 3 Idiots
plot_simple: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

runtime: USA: 133 min (restored version: Library of Congress)
title: All Quiet on the Western Front
filming_locations: RKO-Pathé Studios - 9336 Washington Blvd., Culver City, California, USA
plot_simple: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

title: Kaze no tani no Naushika
plot_simple: Warrior/pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.
also_known_as: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind

title: Rain Man
filming_locations: Caesars Palace - 3570 Las Vegas Boulevard South, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA
plot_simple: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

title: Rosemary's Baby
filming_locations: Dakota Hotel - 1 West 72nd St. at Central Park West, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A young couple move into a new apartment, only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins controlling her life.

title: Incendies
plot_simple: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history, and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

title: Harvey
filming_locations: Colonial Mansion, Backlot, Universal Studios - 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, California, USA
plot_simple: Elwood P. Dowd is a mild-mannered, pleasant man, who just happens (he says) to have an invisible friend resembling a 6-foot rabbit.

title: Jurassic Park
plot_simple: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
plot_simple: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.

title: Taare Zameen Par
plot_simple: An eight year old boy is thought to be lazy and a troublemaker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

title: Mystic River
filming_locations: Bear dens, Long Crouch Woods, Franklin Park, Boston, Massachusetts, USA
plot_simple: With a childhood tragedy that overshadowed their lives, three men are reunited by circumstance when one loses a daughter.

title: Manhattan
filming_locations: 5th Avenue, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A divorced New Yorker currently dating a high-schooler brings himself to look for love in the mistress of his best friend instead.

title: Papillon
plot_simple: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

title: Bom yeoreum gaeul gyeoul geurigo bom
plot_simple: This film takes place in an isolated lake, where an old monk lives on a small floating temple. The wise master has also a young boy with him that teaches to become a monk. And we watch as seasons and years pass by.
also_known_as: Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter... and Spring

title: The Help
plot_simple: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African-American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

title: The Wrestler
filming_locations: 1230 East Linden Avenue, Linden, New Jersey, USA
plot_simple: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

title: Fa yeung nin wa
plot_simple: A man and a woman move in to neighboring Hong Kong apartments and form a bond when they both suspect their spouses of extra-marital activities.

runtime: 84 min (1994 restored version projected at 20 fps)
title: Nosferatu, eine Symphonie des Grauens
plot_simple: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife. Silent classic based on the story "Dracula."

title: Big Fish
plot_simple: A son tries to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths he told about his life.

title: Festen
plot_simple: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.

title: The Untouchables
filming_locations: 40 miles south, Great Falls, Montana, USA
plot_simple: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

title: Disaster Movie

title: The Hottie & the Nottie
plot_simple: Nate moves to L.A. to track down Cristabel, the woman he's been in love with since childhood, only to discover that his plan to woo her only has one hurdle to overcome: what to do with June, Cristabel's ever-present, not-so-hot best friend? What's even more complicating is Nate's growing feelings for June, whose true beauty starts to emerge.

title: Manos: The Hands of Fate
plot_simple: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

title: Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2
plot_simple: A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.

title: Pledge This!
plot_simple: At South Beach University, a beautiful sorority president takes in a group of unconventional freshman girls seeking acceptance into her house.

title: Die Hard Dracula
plot_simple: A modern-day updating of the Dracula legend that finds Steven, a good-looking American hero devastated by the death of his girlfriend...
filming_locations: Hollywood Hills, Los Angeles, California, USA

title: Birdemic: Shock and Terror
plot_simple: A platoon of eagles and vultures attacks the residents of a small town. Many people die. It's not known what caused the flying menace to attack. Two people manage to fight back, but will they survive Birdemic?
filming_locations: Cameron's Restaurant and Inn - 1410 Cabrillo Highway South, Half Moon Bay, California, USA

title: Anne B. Real

filming_locations: New York City, New York, USA

title: From Justin to Kelly
plot_simple: A lonely, sexually repressed man. A depressed woman. A summer camp. On this fateful night, they will meet... and their hearts will become one.
also_known_as: From Justin to Kelly: With Love

title: Going Overboard
filming_locations: Cancún, Benito Juárez, Quintana Roo, Mexico

plot_simple: A young man is transformed into a hideous "moon beast" due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body.

title: The Barbaric Beast of Boggy Creek, Part II
plot_simple: Professor and students camp out to find Bigfoot-type creature.

title: The Maize: The Movie

filming_locations: Sierra de Guadarrama mountain range, Madrid, Spain

plot_simple: A young boy in the woods discovers a lovable alien...or is it?

title: The Wild World of Batwoman
plot_simple: The pointlessly-named Batwoman and her bevy of Batmaidens fight evil and dance.

title: Dünyayi Kurtaran Adam'in oglu
plot_simple: It is intended to be a comedy film with serious special effects, though it becomes an epic film of laughs as the suppressor of the first series of the film 'The man who saves Earth'...
also_known_as: Son of the Man Who Saves the World

title: Crossover
plot_simple: A naturally talented basketball player, Noah Cruise is determined to become a doctor using his basketball scholarship to UCLA pre-med...

title: Girl in Gold Boots
plot_simple: A girl tries to become the top star in the glamorous world of Go-Go Dancing.
also_known_as: Skliroi kai adistaktoi sto dromo tis vias

filming_locations: Film Center Studios, Glendale, California, USA
title: The Creeping Terror
plot_simple: A newlywed sheriff tries to stop a shambling monster that has emerged from a spaceship to eat people.

title: Space Mutiny
plot_simple: A pilot is the only hope to stop the mutiny of a spacecraft by its security crew, who plot to sell the crew of the ship into slavery.

title: Miss Cast Away
plot_simple: A spoof that combines Cast Away with Miss Congeniality, Planet of the Apes, Love Boat, Gilligan's Island, The Sixth Sense, Jurassic Park, and more

title: Daniel - Der Zauberer
plot_simple: Evil assassins want to kill Daniel Kublbock, the third runner up for the German Idols.

title: The Starfighters

title: Fat Slags
plot_simple: The Fat Slags from Viz hit the big time and become celebrities.

title: Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders
plot_simple: Two creepy "horror" films joined together by Merlin's Shop which is, in turn, introduced by a Grandpa telling the story.

title: Ator l'invincibile 2

title: Monster a-Go Go

title: Yûsei ôji
